body_html: @vit-stepanovs Thanks for the PR. What's the size of the resulting DLL? Assuming it's on the larger side, are there any plans to allow it to be smaller? For example there's this discussion about how we can reduce tensorflow's .so size on Android.
body_text: @vit-stepanovs Thanks for the PR. What's the size of the resulting DLL? Assuming it's on the larger side, are there any plans to allow it to be smaller? For example there's this discussion about how we can reduce tensorflow's .so size on Android.
body: @vit-stepanovs Thanks for the PR. What's the size of the resulting DLL? Assuming it's on the larger side, are there any plans to allow it to be smaller? For example there's [this discussion](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/41400873/how-to-reduce-tensorflow-size-for-android) about how we can reduce tensorflow's .so size on Android.
